com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui

Class SubtitlePainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.ui.SubtitlePainter

  • final class SubtitlePainter
extends java.lang.Object
    Paints subtitle Cues.

      private static boolean areCharSequencesEqual(java.lang.CharSequence first, java.lang.CharSequence second)
      This method is used instead of TextUtils.equals(CharSequence, CharSequence) because the latter only checks the text of each sequence, and does not check for equality of styling that may be embedded within the CharSequences.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(Cue cue,
                 boolean applyEmbeddedStyles,
                 boolean applyEmbeddedFontSizes,
                 CaptionStyleCompat style,
                 float textSizePx,
                 float bottomPaddingFraction,
                 android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                 int cueBoxLeft,
                 int cueBoxTop,
                 int cueBoxRight,
                 int cueBoxBottom)
        Draws the provided Cue into a canvas with the specified styling.

        A call to this method is able to use cached results of calculations made during the previous call, and so an instance of this class is able to optimize repeated calls to this method in which the same parameters are passed.

        Parameters:
        cue - The cue to draw.
        applyEmbeddedStyles - Whether styling embedded within the cue should be applied.
        applyEmbeddedFontSizes - If applyEmbeddedStyles is true, defines whether font sizes embedded within the cue should be applied. Otherwise, it is ignored.
        style - The style to use when drawing the cue text.
        textSizePx - The text size to use when drawing the cue text, in pixels.
        bottomPaddingFraction - The bottom padding fraction to apply when Cue.line is Cue.DIMEN_UNSET, as a fraction of the viewport height
        canvas - The canvas into which to draw.
        cueBoxLeft - The left position of the enclosing cue box.
        cueBoxTop - The top position of the enclosing cue box.
        cueBoxRight - The right position of the enclosing cue box.
        cueBoxBottom - The bottom position of the enclosing cue box.

      • setupTextLayout

        private void setupTextLayout()

      • areCharSequencesEqual

        private static boolean areCharSequencesEqual(java.lang.CharSequence first,
                                             java.lang.CharSequence second)
        This method is used instead of TextUtils.equals(CharSequence, CharSequence) because the latter only checks the text of each sequence, and does not check for equality of styling that may be embedded within the CharSequences.
